version_description:
- correct some data
- optimize performance and stability

- Optimizer and plugin experience

- Optimizer and plugin experience

- Add speed test function
- Optimize icon display and performance

- Optimize memory
- Language optional
- Better experience

- Added Vietnamese and Hindi
- Add daily traffic view and auto reset date selection
- Add network test history view
- Optimize experience and stability
If you have any interesting ideas or suggestions, please feel free to contact us in the APP feedback

- Adapt to iOS13 dark mode
- Fixed traffic display issues for 32-bit machines such as the iPhone 5
- Optimize widget display for small fonts
- Optimize experience and stability
You have any interesting ideas or suggestions to contact us in the app feedback.

▸ Add dark mode
▸ Optimize speed measurement
▸ widget display optimization
▸ Optimize experience and stability
Everyone has a practical tool that you can use to give us feedback, we will try our best to design it into the app.

▸ Support 2019 iPad
▸ Optimize memory cleaning
▸ Add a feature-rich compass
▸ APP now supports font replacement
▸ Optimize experience and stability
